page.title: 18"Kerby"-A children's game
page.content:
{KERBY}- the rules
"You need a ball and at least 2 players. Find a safe place to play where there are no cars or lorries. Get on different sides of the road. You have to throw the ball at the opposite kerb. If you hit it and it bounces back you get 1 point. If you throw the ball and it hits the kerb and comes back and hits the kerb you are standing on ( without bouncing ) 2 points are scored. If you miss the opposite kerb your opponent has a turn. You can play up to any number of points but most people play up to 50."
By John Tremble
